    • Method Detail

      • findBeansWithAnnotation

        public static Collection<Object> findBeansWithAnnotation(org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext context,
                                         Class<? extends Annotation> annotation)
        Will find all beans in the ApplicationContext that have been created with the given annotation. This includes both beans having the annotation directly, as beans created through a Configuration class @Bean method where the annotation was present on the method definition.

        Note: only singleton or actually created beans will be returned.

        Parameters:
        annotation - Required annotation.
        Returns:
        List of beans, never null.

      • findSingletonsMatching

        public static Map<String,Object> findSingletonsMatching(org.springframework.context.ApplicationContext context,
                                        BeanFilter filter)

                                                                                              BeanFilter filter)
